case.state: ~Player~! I can see your... phallus! Isn't that very taboo in human culture? Isn't that why this game was fun to begin with?
I think I'm a bit confused, ~player~... I thought this game was fun because you slowly removed clothes and defied established taboos. If you aren't wearing anything down there, what's the point?
So that's your human "flower", ~player~... It's kinda neat! I was hoping to see it later on the game, but at least now I know what to expect!
Hey, I can see your human vagina, ~player~! It looks just like mine, but at the same time, it's totally different! That's neat!
Woah, ~player~! I can see all of your naked torso! I thought that was taboo, but here you are, defying expectations!
You're not afraid of showing yourself a bit, ~player~? Good strategy! Leave them wanting to make you lose as fast as possible, challenge them to make you masturbate!
So, ~player~, you're telling me men can walk around shirtless without any social repercussions? That's hot! Plants walk around naked anyway, perhaps I should follow your example.

Stop me if I'm mistaken, ~player~, but I thought the whole point of this game was to defy social norms by slowly taking off our clothing. If you're not wearing a shirt, doesn't that kinda defeat the purpose?

Oh, drat... It's Halloween again?
The only time of the year I can't attack zombies, because they might be humans in disguise!
All these costumes, the candy... Don't tell me it's Halloween again!?
Happy new year, ~player~! Ready to make this an extra special one?
What better way to celebrate a new year than playing some card games? I can't think of any!
Let's make this new year count, ~player~!
What a year, huh, ~player~? How about one last game of Strip Poker Night at the Inventory to close with a flourish?
This sure has been a long year, ~player~... But we'll start the next one right! Let's finish this one right, too, by playing some card games!
Happy Cinco de Mayo, ~player~! It's also Plants vs. Zombies anniversary, too!
Do you know what day is today, ~player~? It's Plants vs. Zombies anniversary! Let's celebrate together!
Ohh, are we in time for the Lawn of Doom event? I can't wait to see the Jack O'Lanterns return!
Hey, ~player~! Wanna celebrate the Lawn of Doom event with me? I'm sure you and Witch Hazel would get along~

state.text:

You can't steal it!
Name yourself something else, you cheater!

case.state:

I see an Imp has made its way to the table. Don't worry, I'll burn it right away!

Those keen eyes... That eye-hand coordination... I sense that a gamer has entered the table. As a fellow enjoyer of the electronic arts, I'll make sure this game is worth ~target.ifMale(his|her)~ time.

We could always use another player! Come on ~target~, join us!

Bring it on, ~target~!

Join in! The more the berrier!

Aww, don't be Blue! I'll protect you from all those monsters and killers you surround yourself with!
